description.value:
Wondrous item, uncommon
This seashell is intricately carved with protective runes. If you are carrying the shell and are reduced to 0 hit points or incapacitated, the shell activates, creating a bubble of force that expands to surround you and forces any other creatures out of your space. This sphere works like the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.tXnBDlCTKcRlzn8w]{wall of force} spell, except that any creature intent on aiding you can pass through it. The protective sphere lasts for 10 minutes, or until you regain at least 1 hit point or are no longer incapacitated. When the protective sphere ends, the shell crumbles to dust.
